td.content: s:white F dock worker aged 60 Ys presents with 3 weeks history of moderate tingling in feet. patient also reports mild dry skin, mild dry mouth, Diabetes. o:Height 69 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, PMI not displaced, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Eyes = yellowish white discoloration noted on the retina and microaneurysms, appears in NAD, Extremities = no edema, no skin breakdown, 2 + dorsalis pedis pulses a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology.
